query:
WITH user_orgs AS (
                SELECT organization_id
                FROM user_organizations
                WHERE user_id = $1
            )
            SELECT a.app_id, a.name, a.description, a.created_at
            FROM apps a
            INNER JOIN user_orgs uo ON uo.organization_id = a.organization_id
            ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
            LIMIT $2
